meanings.sent1: Using a humidifier can help decongest your stuffy nose.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a nasal spray to decongest my sinuses.
meanings.sent3: I tried to decongest the traffic by taking a different route.
meanings.sent4: Her soothing voice seemed to decongest the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The warm tea worked like magic to decongest my throat.

meanings.definition: To clear or open up a passage or space by removing congestion.
meanings.sent1: Eucalyptus oil can help decongest your clogged airways.
meanings.sent2: The plumber used a special tool to decongest the blocked drain.
meanings.sent3: I need to decongest my messy desk to find my pen.
meanings.sent4: The music seemed to decongest the crowded dance floor.
meanings.sent5: The fresh air after the rain helped decongest the city streets.
